name: Timers
description:
Detailed overlays for timer based mechanics.
Timers include: Sabetha cannons, Dhuum greens, and much more.
Never miss important raid/strike/fractal mechanics again!

When this module is enabled, a new folder called 'timers' will be created under '...\Documents\Guild Wars 2\addons\blish hud\timers'. Drag and drop timer files (.bhtimer) and their related assets into this folder to make them available to Blish HUD.

Special thanks to FreeSnow, Temp, and QuitarHero
